analysis.description:
AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#244-254) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#252)
AbstractSale.toBytes20 (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#231-240) is declared view but contains assembly code

ZenomeSale (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#645-702) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol)

ERC20ReceiveAdapter.receive (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#137-147) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#143-144)

AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#244-254) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(_token).transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#252-253)

MintingSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#279-280) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(buyer,sold.add(bonus)) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#280)

Reentrancy in ZenomeSale.emulatePurchase (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol):
	External calls:
	- doPurchase(beneficiary,amount,bonus) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cap (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol)

AbstractSale.toBytes20 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#231-240)
	- /unique_chucks/42/0xa660b00c28b0eb2cf57787abf60e3b0c44e9325b.sol#237-240
